alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:07PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Weld and east central Larimer Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 407 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Livermore, or 15 miles north of Fort Collins, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Fort Collins, Wellington, Pierce, Nunn, Carr, Livermore and Rockport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
